PMC:ReportSelectionTable
Enter Warehouse No. or (ALL) Text PPDField01 1 4 R Enter Warehouse # or (ALL)
Enter Order Due Date (MM/DD/YY) Text PPDField02 6 8 R Enter the due date the backorders will be projected from.
Enter Customer No. or (ALL) Text PPDField03 1 8 R Enter a valid customer number or (ALL)
Enter Starting Order No. or (ALL) Text PPDField04 1 7 R Enter the starting order # or (ALL)
Enter Ending Order No. or (ALL) Text PPDField05 1 7 R Enter the ending order # or (ALL)
